text: Tarhan Erdem (1933 – 8 June 2022) was a Turkish politician. He was born in Kurucaşile, Turkey. He was a member of the Republican People's Party. Erdem was a member of the Member of the Grand National Assembly from 1977 until 1980. He was the Minister of Industry and Technology for one month in 1977. Erdem died on 8 June 2022 at a hospital in Bodrum, Turkey from problems caused by a stroke, aged 89.Tarhan Erdem hayatını kaybetti ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Turkish politicians Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Tarhan Erdem
